mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id, r.id AS roleId, p.id AS permissionId, r.code AS roleCode, p.code AS permissionCode FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id=#{userId}
